meanings.sent1: The godlings watched over the forest with care.
meanings.sent2: The villagers believed in the existence of godlings.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous godlings played pranks on the other deities.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of myth, the godlings danced among the stars.
meanings.sent5: Legends spoke of powerful godlings shaping the world.

meanings.sent1: The godlings of the river were known for their kindness.
meanings.sent2: The ancient texts mentioned many godlings of various powers.
meanings.sent3: The godlings of mischief often caused trouble in the divine realm.
meanings.sent4: Among the pantheon, the godlings were like flickering candles.
meanings.sent5: The small godlings whispered secrets in the night.

meanings.sent1: The godlings of the mountain were revered by the locals.
meanings.sent2: Legends told of godlings walking among mortals in disguise.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous godlings played pranks on unsuspecting travelers.
meanings.sent4: In the ancient tales, godlings were said to possess great powers.
meanings.sent5: The ethereal godlings shimmered in the moonlight.
